item.title: Teleporting out of jail?
item.dc:creator: @Shaloxis Shaloxis
item.description:
@Shaloxis wrote:

Find your teleporting buttons, in clickingbuttons.java,

declare the inJail method

like
} else (isInJail); {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot teleport out of jail.”);
return false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting out of jail?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Your teleports access a variable. Your method … is a method. How do i word that differently?

isJailed has nothing to do with being in jail in the code you posted. It looks like a useless variable.

change

if (c.isJailed)

to
if (c.isInJail())

[quote=“1 2 3 4 KOED, post:1, topic:542168”]Alright so basically when I jail another player they are still able to teleport out of jail.

Here is my player.java/playerassistant.java

public boolean isInJail() {
if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3112 && absY >= 9508 && absY <= 9524) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

public void spellTeleport(final int x, final int y, final int height) {
if (c.isJailed)
c.sendMessage(“You are jailed please appeal on the forums.”);
c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
return;
}

public void startTeleport(final int x, final int y, final int height,
		final String teleportType) {
	if (c.isJailed) {
		c.sendMessage("You are jailed please appeal on the forums.");
		c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
		return;
	}

public void movePlayer(final int x, final int y, final int h) {
if (c.isJailed) {
c.sendMessage(“You are jailed please appeal on the forums.”);
c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
return;
}[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting out of jail?
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Alright so basically when I jail another player they are still able to teleport out of jail.

Here is my player.java/playerassistant.java

public boolean isInJail() {
if(absX >= 3090 && absX <= 3112 && absY >= 9508 && absY <= 9524) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

public void spellTeleport(final int x, final int y, final int height) {
if (c.isJailed)
c.sendMessage(“You are jailed please appeal on the forums.”);
c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
return;
}

public void startTeleport(final int x, final int y, final int height,
		final String teleportType) {
	if (c.isJailed) {
		c.sendMessage("You are jailed please appeal on the forums.");
		c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
		return;
	}

public void movePlayer(final int x, final int y, final int h) {
if (c.isJailed) {
c.sendMessage(“You are jailed please appeal on the forums.”);
c.sendMessage(""+Config.FORUM_URL);
return;
}

Read full topic
